subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson once again became the No. 2 player in the world Sunday by winning The Players Championship, closing with a 3-under 69 for a two-shot victory.
snippet: Phil Mickelson once again became the No. 2 player in the world Sunday by winning The Players Championship, closing with a 3-under 69 for a two-shot victory.
